Articles.Content:
On floor 106 you find a 12 stage rocket. It has a few markings on it that look like they\'ve been created by a chainsaw and an inscription on the side says 'Jeb was here'

Do you:

1) Ride it

2) Run away from it

3) Try and find Jeb who is now popping up everywhere
1, You ride it up to floor 107, Which happens to be in orbit.
You orbit around to the apoapsis, on floor 108, and find a space station.
You go to 109 and find the Mun.
You descend to 108 and pass under the Mun\'s surface.
You go back to floor 109 and find the Mun again.
An incredible crash has forced the Mun upwards and you arrive at floor 110.
You are now in an excape trajectory out of kerbins gravity. Your also in floor 111.
You go to floor 112 and realise that the floating-gravity thing was just an anomaly and you are still on kerbin and the gravity returns to normal.
You descend to floor 111 and find the gravity still weirded out. :/

You go to level 112...

You still THINK that you escape from kerbin, but you are still in the skyscraper.
You go to level 113, and find no walls supporting the next level... wtf?
You go to level 114, and find a parrot that is drawing a giant Rube Goldberg machine
Up to level 115. SPA!

You go up to level 116, and find a giant goose staring down upon you. Below it, a little baby goose, laying solid gold eggs. You dash for the eggs, hoping to become rich. You take one and notice its extremely light. Accidentally, you drop it on the giant goose, and it is revealed that the egg is filled with confetti. You -

a) become enraged, and attack the geese

go to the next level, confetti and all

c) take a few more confetti eggs, and sell them on the Easter market

d) take a few more confetti eggs and keep them for later use

a) become enraged, and attack the geese

As a result, the goose flings you up to level 117, where you find the owner of the goose.
level 118, you find a grenade thats pin has been pulled
...which you throw down to level 117, killing the owner of the geese. You then walk up to level 119, where you find...

You become enraged and attack the geese, but are chased by the geese to level 118.

You find a rocket launch pad.

Erm, mince... you missed a few.

... on level 119, you find an empty elevator shaft. Do you:

a) Jump down

Climb up
You ignore the shaft and go up the stairs again, to floor 120.
On floor 120 is a tyrannosaurus rex. You flee to level 121, and...
...Run into a hole back down to floor 120...
After being eaten by the dinosaur, you are burped back up to level 121.
But then fall back down the hole. Back to floor 120 for you.
